channel.title: RuneSource Item Slot Error
channel.description: Hello, recently I have noticed a few problems with RuneSource (Azure Version). When I try to equip either the Zombie Shirt or the Mime Shirt, they go to the weapon slot instead of the body slot. Where should I look to fix this?

item.title: RuneSource Item Slot Error
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

I added it to only platebody, and it still equips to the body slot. Thanks for the help all, now to fix the mask

Read full topic

item.title: RuneSource Item Slot Error
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

You need to add it to body AND platebody. So it equips to the body slot, and covers the arms like a platebody.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneSource Item Slot Error
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

zyle1992, could you provide more info? As I have added the Mime Top to the same array (BODY, in the Equipment class) as the Green D’hide Body, yet it is still the same.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneSource Item Slot Error
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

^.

The same concept between full masks (not rendering hair and beards, otherwise they poke out), hats (i.e wizard hats, render the beard and hair) and masks (i.e mime mask, render the hair as a short shave but not the beard).

Read full topic

item.title: RuneSource Item Slot Error
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

It’s the same problem as the old winterLove servers. You need to declare it as the same types as the dragonhide armor (BODY), basically saying that it should change the model being rendered, instead of rendering it on top of the existing model.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneSource Item Slot Error
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

I have got it into the correct slot, yet now the Mime Shirt does not go on top correctly. It has some overlay problems between the sleeves of the character’s shirt, and the sleeves of the mime shirt.

Picture:

9t6Ty.png783×541

Any ideas?

Read full topic

item.title: RuneSource Item Slot Error
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

I believe you have to add them to the ItemDefs.xml as it’s a very incomplete server. I had to do this for Cooking gauntlets.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneSource Item Slot Error
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

It was meant to be a month-long ban, that happened to coincide with the forum software update, leaving me permanently banned, but luckily I contacted a moderator and got unbanned.

Anyway, I have looked in both equipdefs.xml and itemdefs.xml and there is nothing related to those items in equipdefs.xml. I found the following code in itemdefs.xml, yet I don’t think it affects the slot. <itemDef> <id>7592</id> <name>Zombie shirt</name> <lowAlchValue>0</lowAlchValue> <highAlchValue>0</highAlchValue> <shopBuyValue>0</shopBuyValue> <shopSellValue>0</shopSellValue> <marketPrice>0</marketPrice> <stackable>false</stackable> <note>false</note> <parentId>-1</parentId> </itemDef>
I will now look in the Equipment class.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneSource Item Slot Error
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

I believe there’s an XML file in data? Also take a look at the Equipment class in package *.model(?). Wasn’t you banned?

Read full topic

item.title: RuneSource Item Slot Error
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

Hello, recently I have noticed a few problems with RuneSource (Azure Version).
When I try to equip either the Zombie Shirt or the Mime Shirt, they go to the weapon slot instead of the body slot. Where should I look to fix this?

Read full topic
